weloveclouds.server.core

Class Server<M,R extends IExecutable<M> & IValidatable<R>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • weloveclouds.commons.networking.AbstractServer<M>
        • weloveclouds.server.core.Server<M,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - the type of the message the server accepts
    R - the type of the request which shall be created from M
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Server<M,R extends IExecutable<M> & IValidatable<R>>
extends AbstractServer<M>
    A Server instance which accepts messages over the network and can handle multiple clients concurrently. For further details refer to SimpleConnectionHandler.
